projects.title: Profile Page
projects.description: This profile gives additional insight on my experience. Feel free to check it out!

projects.title: Random Quote Generator
projects.description: This app displays famous random quotes everytime you click the button!

projects.title: Word Guessing Game
projects.description: This is the first game I have ever built. Simply guess the phrase and choose wisely. You only have 5 attempts!

projects.title: Awesome Startup API
projects.description: This is the first API-based app I have built. It showcases a list of 12 employees, including additional information if you click on their card!

projects.title: Interactive Form
projects.description: I enhanced an interactive registration form using Javascript. A powerful tool that makes it possible for a site to not only function, but improve your experience on the web.
